types.html:
lèvres externes f pl (plural only)

  1. labia majora
    Synonym: grandes lèvres
    Pendant l'excitation sexuelle, les lèvres externes gonflent en raison de l'augmentation du flux sanguin vers la région et reculent, ouvrant légèrement la vulve.
    During sexual arousal, the labia majora become engorged because of the increased blood flow to the region, and spread apart, opening the vulva slightly.

See also

[edit]
  • lèvres internes
